project.name: Dart-TaskMaster Integration Test
project.description: Testing the integration between Dart and TaskMaster
project.author: Anwar Selo

tasks.title: Set up integration environment
tasks.description: Set up the development environment for the integration
tasks.details: Install dependencies, configure environment variables, and set up the project structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all components start successfully.

tasks.title: Implement MCP connector
tasks.description: Create the core MCP connector module
tasks.details: Implement bidirectional communication between Dart and TaskMaster.
tasks.testStrategy: Test message passing in both directions.

tasks.title: Create webhook handler
tasks.description: Implement webhook handler for Dart events
tasks.details: Create an Express server to receive and process webhooks from Dart.
tasks.testStrategy: Send test webhooks and verify processing.

tasks.title: Test Task from Dart
tasks.description: This is a test task created from Dart

tasks.title: MCP Integration Test Task
tasks.description: This is an updated test task to verify the MCP integration between Dart and TaskMaster
